Name: ScienceOpen
Description: Natural and physical sciences, social sciences, and humanities. Incorporates arXiv, PubMed, and SciELO. Integrated with ORCID Altmetric uids. Articles from >25,000 journals.

Name: Google Scholar
Description: The biggest academic database & search engine (over 390 million records, unofficial estimate)

Name: CountryOfPapers
Description: Academic journal searcher and comparator engine. Focuses on publication price, speed and journal indexation among different official databases

Name: Civil engineering database
Description: A bibliographic database covering all of ASCE's publications since 1872

Name: Information Bridge: Department of Energy Scientific and Technical Information
Description: Provides free public access to over 266,000 full-text documents and bibliographic citations of Department of Energy (DOE) research report literature. Documents are primarily from 1991 forward.

Name: Aminer
Description: Online service used to index and search academic social networks

Name: BASE: Bielefeld Academic Search Engine
Description: Metadata for 260 million documents from more than 8,000 content providers

Name: COnnecting REpositories (CORE)
Description: A full text aggregator of all open access papers from repositories (institutional, subject, preprints, etc.) and journals. Around 20 million monthly active users.
Lokation: Walton Hall, Kents Hill, Milton Keynes MK7 6AA, Storbritannien

Name: Semantic Scholar
Description: Mostly computer science and biomedical publications. Powered by semantic analysis.

Name: AGRIS: Agricultural database
Description: Covers agriculture, forestry, animal husbandry, aquatic sciences and fisheries, human nutrition, extension literature from over 100 countries. Indexes unpublished scientific and technical reports, theses, conference papers, government publications.

Name: Crossref
Description: An official Digital Object Identifier (DOI) Registration Agency of the International DOI Foundation. Metadata about publications, datasets, grants, preprints from 17,633 members (journals, publishers, etc.)

Name: EconBiz
Description: Covers journals, working papers & conferences in business studies and economics
Provider(s): ZBW- German National Library of Economics– Leibniz Information Centre for Economics (ZBW)
Lokation: ZBW- German National Library of Economics– Leibniz Information Centre for Economics (ZBW)

Name: ResearchGate
Description: Commercial social networking site for scientists and researchers. Over 19 million registered users that share their articles, datasets and other research output.

Name: Science.gov
Description: A gateway to government science information and research results from over 60 databases, over 2,200 websites, and over 200 million pages.

Name: Springer link
Description: Providing researchers with access to millions of scientific documents from journals

Name: Science direct
Description: ScienceDirect is the world's leading source for scientific, technical, and medical research

Name: Taylor and Francis
Description: Search and explore the millions of quality, peer-reviewed journal articles published under the Taylor & Francis and Routledge imprints.
Lokation: Milton Park, Abingdon-on-Thames, Oxfordshire United Kingdom
